May 15-17, 2020  August 14-16, 2019  December 16-18, 2020  March 19-21, 2021  May 14-16, 2021      Red Multisite WordPress   Maintenance windows begin at 8:30am on Tuesdays and last 1-2 minutes. There is no expected downtime during this period, but please be aware that brief interruptions are possible.     Maintenance Calendar   Approved changes to the Maintenance Calendar are reviewed by the Change Advisory Board and scheduled for implementation.   Open Maintenance Calendar           Service Status   Subscribe to the Service Outage email list for notifications: Subscribe     View the current system status availability: System Status        Service Notices        VoIP phone issues [update]  Friday, May 8, 2020  5/9/20, 3:00am — We are aware that some users may be experiencing issues calling on-campus VoIP phones. ACCC VoIP engineers continue working with AT&T and Cisco support to troubleshoot the problem. We apologize…          WordPress Server Maintenance 5/21  Friday, May 8, 2020  ACCC will be performing maintenance on the wordpress.cc.uic.edu server Thursday, May 21, from 7:30am to 9:30am. There is no expected downtime during this time period, but please be aware that a brief interruption…          UIC Web Site Maintenance 5/10  Friday, May 8, 2020  ACCC will be performing maintenance on the UIC web site (uic.edu) Sunday, May 10, from 4:00pm to 9:00pm. This maintenance will include security enhancements, improve reliability,  and align better with the UIC brand.…          Microsoft Teams presence (status) issue [resolved]  Tuesday, May 5, 2020  5/5/20, 7:48pm — Microsoft has resolved the infrastructure problem affecting Microsoft Teams presence (status). Service is fully restored and working as expected. For questions, please contact consult@uic.edu. 5/5/20, 4:26pm — Some users may…          ACCC Maintenance Window: May 15 - 17 Planned Downtime Schedule  Thursday, April 30, 2020          Request Tracker (RT) issues [resolved]  Wednesday, April 29, 2020  Some users may have experienced issues accessing Request Tracker (RT) on Wednesday, April 29, between 2:00pm and 2:35pm. We have identified the problem and restored service. We apologize for the inconvenience. For questions,…          Echo360 Lecture Capture issue [resolved]  Tuesday, April 28, 2020  4/28/20, 3:46pm — The Echo360 Lecture Capture issue has been resolved and service is operational. We apologize for the inconvenience. For questions, please contact: LTS@uic.edu 4/28/20, 3:09pm — Some users may be experiencing issues…          Zoom Data Center Region Restriction 4/20  Thursday, April 16, 2020  ACCC will be implementing a restriction on data center regions utilized by Zoom meeting traffic to use only United States data centers starting on Monday, April 20, at 10:00am. If you have any…          Authentication Maintenance 4/28  Thursday, April 16, 2020  ACCC will be updating the SSL (security) certificate used for Shibboleth authentication on Tuesday, April 28, from 7:05am to 7:10am. This brief update will require a restart of the service and new authentication…        See more Service Notices           Service Status           Service Notices
